topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bc1d9b6368723962530900#post_54bc1d9b6368723962530900
From Rising alone

>picked up and tossed a Metal Gear Ray like a ragdoll
>smashed into a bell tower and kept going like it was nothing
>picked up and tossed an even BIGGER Metal Gear and used it's arm which is about the size of RAY as a sword
>got the shit beaten out of him by a senator high on nanomachines and was still battle ready
>punched through Armstrong's chest to tear out his head and Sam's sword could barely cut the man

He's pretty fucking strong.
